long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸ¬âœ‚ï¸ Cut the Rope â€“ Feed Om Nom!

Dive into the sweet and addictive world of Cut the Rope, where your mission is to feed the adorable monster, Om Nom! This charming puzzle game combines physics with fun as you strategically cut ropes to deliver candy right into Om Nom's mouth. Each level presents a new challenge with obstacles and stars to collect, testing your timing and problem-solving skills. Whether you're playing for a quick break or aiming to complete every level with a perfect score, Cut the Rope is sure to keep you entertained!

ğŸŒŸ Why Install Cut the Rope?

Engaging Puzzles: Enjoy over 100 levels of creative and challenging puzzles that require strategic thinking and precise timing.
Adorable Character: Meet Om Nom, the lovable little monster who just can't get enough candy!
Physics-Based Fun: Experience the satisfying mechanics of rope cutting, gravity, and momentum.
Collect Stars: Add an extra layer of challenge by collecting stars in each level to unlock bonuses.
Instant Play: No need to downloadâ€”play directly in your browser and start feeding Om Nom immediately!

ğŸ•¹ï¸ Features:

Game Menu: Access all your options from the game menu in the top-left corner.
Fullscreen Mode: Immerse yourself in the game by going fullscreen with just a click.
Rate & Share: Show your love for the game by rating it and sharing your high scores on social media using the icons in the bottom-right corner!
Are you ready to cut the ropes and satisfy Om Nomâ€™s sweet tooth? Install Cut the Rope today and start your candy-filled adventure! ğŸ­
